general_advisory: As per the extended range forecast of IMD, MC, Bhubaneswar, dry weather along with normal to below normal minimum temperature is expected over the districts of Odisha. Farmers are advised to protect the crop and animal from cold conditions. Vaccination should be avoided in animals during foggy days and cold wave period.

advisory: To control weeds in nursery, farmers should spray Pyrazosulfuron-ethyl 10% WP at 80g/acre at 3-5 days after sowing or Bispyribac sodium at 120ml/acre at 10-12 DAS

Transplanting of 3-5 week old seedlings should be advised in well-puddled soil, spacing of 15cm x 15cm, 3-4 seedlings per hill, shallow depth, apply DAP + MOP or Urea + SSP + MOP as basal dose during final puddling
Prevalent weather conditions are favorable for Aphid attack in mustard, regular monitoring against this insect is advised
At present, attack of Aphid is noticed in some fields, spraying of Acetamiprid or Imidachloprid should be advised under dry weather condition
Wrap or fix polythene/alkathane sheet tightly on mango trees to manage mango mealy bug
Training and pruning of diseased and unwanted branches and leaves should be advised
Straw can be used as mulching material to maintain soil moisture and temperature during winter season
Harvesting of matured crops and one light irrigation in crops in vegetative growth stage should be advised
Cover animal shelter from all sides during the night to avoid direct exposure to cold winds, use dry straw as animal bedding
Weak and sick animals should be covered with sack cloth to protect them from cold, keep all animals in a covered shelter during the night
Avoid keeping animals in a damp area, protect them from smoke to prevent pneumonia, feed animals with a mixture of oil cakes and jiggery, pregnant animals should be given additional feed
